Hoffmann M
,
Kleine-Weber H
,
Schroeder S
SARS-CoV-2 cell entry depends on ACE2 and TMPRSS2 and is blocked by a clinically proven protease inhibitor. Cell 181( 2), 271– 280.e8 ( 2020). 32142651

note.p: •• This is a fundamental study on viral entry essential to designing an antiviral and understanding the underlying biology of the novel virus.
